name: Cometa - Image server
description: Super fast on-demand, on-the-fly, image processing.

PORT.description: The port on which the application will listen.

COMETA_KEY.description: Your unique key used to sign requests. Change this to something hard to guess.

NOAUTH_ALLOWED.description: Allow unsigned requests. This should not be 'true'.

REQUEST_TIMEOUT.description: Request timeout when trying to download images from URLs.
